class Solution {
   public:
    int longestOnes(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        int n = nums.size(), ans = 0, front = 0, temp = 0;
        queue<int> q;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (nums[i] == 0) {
                if (q.size() == k) {
                    if (k == 0) {
                        ans = max(ans, temp);
                        temp = 0;
                    } else {
                        ans = max(ans, temp);
                        temp = i - q.front();
                        q.pop();
                        q.push(i);
                    }
                } else {
                    q.push(i);
                    temp++;
                }
            } else {
                temp++;
            }
        }
        ans = max(ans, temp);
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int C(long long x){
        if(x<2){
            return 0;
        }
        long long ans=x*(x-1)/2;
        return ans;
    }
    int numPairsDivisibleBy60(vector<int>& time) {
        vector<int> minute(60);
        for(auto t:time){
            minute[t%60]++;
        }
        int ans=C(minute[0]);
        for(int i=1;i<30;i++){
            ans+=minute[i]*minute[60-i];
        }
        ans+=C(minute[30]);
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int maxDepth(TreeNode* root) {
        return root == nullptr ? 0 : 1 + max(maxDepth(root->left), maxDepth(root->right));
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string gcdOfStrings(string str1, string str2) {
        string now,ans="",longString,shortString;
        if(str1.size()<str2.size()){
            longString=str2;
            shortString=str1;
        }
        else{
            longString=str1;
            shortString=str2;
        }
        bool chk;
        for(auto c:shortString){
            now+=c;
            chk=true;
            for(int i=0;i<shortString.size();i+=now.size()){
                if(shortString.substr(i,now.size()).size()==now.size()){
                    // cout<<shortString.substr(i,now.size())<<endl;
                    if(shortString.substr(i,now.size())!=now){
                        chk=false;
                    }
                }else{
                    chk=false;
                }
            }
            for(int i=0;i<longString.size();i+=now.size()){
                if(longString.substr(i,now.size()).size()==now.size()){
                    // cout<<shortString.substr(i,now.size())<<endl;
                    if(longString.substr(i,now.size())!=now){
                        chk=false;
                    }
                }else{
                    chk=false;
                }
            }
            if(chk&&longString.size()%now.size()==0&&shortString.size()%now.size()==0){
                // cout<<now<<endl;
                ans=now;
            }
            // cout<<now<<endl;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<string> findOcurrences(string text, string first, string second) {
        vector<string> words;
        string word="";
        for(auto c:text){
            if(c==' '){
                words.push_back(word);
                word="";
            }else{
                word=word+c;
            }
        }
        if(word!=""){
            words.push_back(word);
        }
        vector<string> ans;
        int n=words.size();
        for(int i=2;i<n;i++){
            if(words[i-2]==first&&words[i-1]==second){
                ans.push_back(words[i]);
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    TreeNode* pushNode(vector<int>& nums,int left,int right){
        if(left<=right){
            int mid=(left+right)/2;
            TreeNode* root = new TreeNode(nums[mid]);
            root->left = pushNode(nums,left,mid-1);
            root->right = pushNode(nums,mid+1,right);
            return root;
        }
        return nullptr;
    }
    TreeNode* sortedArrayToBST(vector<int>& nums) {
        return pushNode(nums,0,nums.size()-1);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<double> sampleStats(vector<int>& count) {
        vector<pair<int,int>> nums;
        double total=0,minV=256,maxV=0,maxCntVal=0,median,now;
        int maxCnt=0,cnt=0;
        for(int i=0;i<256;i++){
            now=count[i];
            if(now>0){
                total+=i*now;
                cnt+=now;
                nums.push_back({i,cnt});
                minV=min(minV,i*1.0);
                maxV=max(maxV,i*1.0);
                if(now>maxCnt){
                    maxCnt=now;
                    maxCntVal=i;
                }
            }
        }
        for(auto num:nums){
            if(num.second>cnt/2){
                median=num.first;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(cnt%2==0){
            for(auto num:nums){
                if(num.second>=cnt/2){
                    median=(median+num.first)/2;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        return {minV,maxV,total/cnt,median,maxCntVal};
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int tribonacci(int n) {
        int T[38];
        T[0] = 0;
        T[1] = 1;
        T[2] = 1;
        for (int i = 3; i <= n; i++) {
            T[i] = T[i - 3] + T[i - 2] + T[i - 1];
        }
        return T[n];
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool checkCount(vector<int> a,vector<int> b){
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(a[i]<b[i]){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    int countCharacters(vector<string>& words, string chars) {
        int ans=0;
        vector<int> target(26);
        for(auto c:chars){
            target[c-'a']++;
        }
        for(auto word:words){
            vector<int> temp(26);
            for(auto c:word){
                temp[c-'a']++;
            }
            if(checkCount(target,temp)){
                ans+=word.size();
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool uniqueOccurrences(vector<int>& arr) {
        vector<int> cnt(2005, 0);
        for (auto a : arr) {
            cnt[a + 1000]++;
        }
        sort(cnt.begin(), cnt.end(), greater<int>());
        int temp = cnt[0] + 1;
        for (auto c : cnt) {
            if (c == 0) {
                break;
            }
            if (temp == c) {
                return false;
            }
            temp = c;
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool checkStraightLine(vector<vector<int>>& coordinates) {
        int x1=coordinates[0][0],y1=coordinates[0][1];
        int diffx=coordinates[1][0]-coordinates[0][0];
        int diffy=coordinates[1][1]-coordinates[0][1];
        for(auto c:coordinates){
            if(diffx*(c[1]-y1)!=diffy*(c[0]-x1)){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    string minRemoveToMakeValid(string s) {
        int left = 0, right = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
            if (s[i] == '(') {
                left++;
            } else if (s[i] == ')') {
                if (left == 0 || left == right) {
                    s.erase(i, 1);
                    i--;
                } else {
                    right++;
                }
            }
        }
        for (int i = s.size() - 1; left > right && i >= 0; i--) {
            if (s[i] == '(') {
                s.erase(i, 1);
                i++;
                left--;
            }
        }
        return s;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int subtractProductAndSum(int n) {
        int pro=1,sum=0;
        while(n>0){
            pro*=n%10;
            sum+=n%10;
            n/=10;
        }
        return pro-sum;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int findNode(int v, TreeNode* root) {
        if (!root->left && !root->right) {
            return v;
        }
        int temp = 0;
        if (root->left) {
            temp += findNode(v * 10 + root->left->val, root->left);
        }
        if (root->right) {
            temp += findNode(v * 10 + root->right->val, root->right);
        }
        return temp;
    }

    int sumNumbers(TreeNode* root) { return findNode(root->val, root); }
};

class Solution {
public:
    void findAns(int& ans,TreeNode* root,bool parent,bool grand){
        if(root==NULL){
            return;
        }
        if(grand){
            ans+=root->val;
        }
        findAns(ans,root->left,root->val%2==0,parent);
        findAns(ans,root->right,root->val%2==0,parent);
    }

    int sumEvenGrandparent(TreeNode* root) {
        int ans=0;
        findAns(ans,root->left,root->val%2==0,false);
        findAns(ans,root->right,root->val%2==0,false);
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int maximum69Number (int num) {
        int ans=num;
        int temp=num;
        for(int i=1;temp>0;i++){
            if(temp%10==6){
                ans=max(ans,int(int(num/pow(10,i))*pow(10,i)+9*pow(10,i-1)+num%int(pow(10,i-1))));
            }else{
                ans=max(ans,int(int(num/pow(10,i))*pow(10,i)+6*pow(10,i-1)+num%int(pow(10,i-1))));
            }
            temp/=10;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    static bool cmp(pair<char,vector<int>> a, pair<char,vector<int>> b){
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(a.second[i]!=b.second[i]){
                return a.second[i]>b.second[i];
            }
        }
        return a.first<b.first;
    }
    string rankTeams(vector<string>& votes) {
        vector<pair<char,vector<int>>> temp(26,{' ',vector<int>(26,0)});
        for(auto c:votes[0]){
            temp[c-'A'].first=c;
        }
        int voteSize=votes[0].size();
        for(auto vote:votes){
            for(int i=0;i<voteSize;i++){
                temp[vote[i]-'A'].second[i]++;
            }
        }
        sort(temp.begin(),temp.end(),cmp);
        string ans="";
        for(auto t:temp){
            if(t.first!=' '){
                ans+=t.first;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int singleNumber(vector<int>& nums) {
        int bits[32] = {0};
        for (auto num : nums) {
            for (int i = 0; i < 32; i++) {
                bits[i] += (num >> i) & 1;
            }
        }
        int ans = 0;
        for (int i = 31; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans = (ans << 1) + (bits[i] % 3);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    static bool cmp(string a, string b) { return a.size() > b.size(); }

    bool wordBreak(string s, vector<string>& wordDict) {
        sort(wordDict.begin(), wordDict.end(), cmp);
        vector<int> idx;
        int wordDict_size = wordDict.size(), now = 0;
        bool chk;
        while (s != "") {
            chk = true;
            for (int i = now; i < wordDict_size; i++) {
                int word_size = wordDict[i].size();
                if (s.substr(0, word_size) == wordDict[i]) {
                    // cout<<wordDict[i]<<endl;
                    idx.push_back(i);
                    i = -1;
                    chk = false;
                    s = s.substr(word_size, s.size());
                }
            }
            if (chk && idx.size() == 0) {
                break;
            }
            if (now == wordDict_size) {
                break;
            }
            if (chk) {
                now = idx.back();
                s = wordDict[now] + s;
                now++;
                idx.pop_back();
            }
            // cout<<s<<endl;
        }
        return s == "";
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int findLucky(vector<int>& arr) {
        sort(arr.begin(),arr.end(),greater<int>());
        int now=arr[0],cnt=0;
        for(auto a:arr){
            if(a==now){
                cnt++;
            }else{
                if(cnt==now){
                    return cnt;
                }
                now=a;
                cnt=1;
            }
        }
        if(cnt==arr.back()){
            return cnt;
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool hasCycle(ListNode *head) {
        if(head==NULL||head->next==NULL||head->next->next==NULL){
            return false;
        }
        ListNode *f=head,*s=head;
        while(f!=NULL&&f->next!=NULL){
            f=f->next->next;
            s=s->next;
            if(f==s){
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;

    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    void reorderList(ListNode* head) {
        vector<int> val;
        ListNode *now=head;
        while(now){
            val.push_back(now->val);
            now=now->next;
        }
        int l=0,r=val.size()-1,n=r;
        now=head;
        while(l<=r){
            if(n-r<l){
                now->val=val[r];
                r--;
                now=now->next;
            }else{
                now->val=val[l];
                l++;
                now=now->next;
            }
        }
        return;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<bool> kidsWithCandies(vector<int>& candies, int extraCandies) {
        int n=candies.size();
        vector<bool> ans(n);
        int chk;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            chk=true;
            for(auto c:candies){
                if(candies[i]+extraCandies<c){
                    chk=false;
                }
            }
            ans[i]=chk;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string reverseWords(string s) {
        stringstream input;
        string now,ans;
        input<<s;
        while(true){
            input>>now;
            if(input.fail()) break;
            if(ans==""){
                ans=now;
            }else{
                ans=now+" "+ans;
            }
            cout<<now<<endl;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int numWaterBottles(int numBottles, int numExchange) {
        int ans=numBottles;
        while(numBottles>=numExchange){
            ans+=numBottles/numExchange;
            numBottles=numBottles/numExchange+numBottles%numExchange;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    string makeGood(string s) {
        for (int i = 0; i < s.size() - 1 && s != ""; i++) {
            if (abs(s[i + 1] - s[i]) == 32) {
                s.erase(i, 2);
                i = -1;
            }
        }
        return s;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    ListNode *getIntersectionNode(ListNode *headA, ListNode *headB) {
        ListNode *temp=headA;
        vector<int*> A,B;
        while(headA!=NULL){
            A.push_back(&headA->val);
            headA=headA->next;
        }
        while(headB!=NULL){
            B.push_back(&headB->val);
            headB=headB->next;
        }
        int n=A.size(),m=B.size();
        int idx;
        int chk=false;
        for(idx=1;idx<=min(n,m);idx++){
            if(A[n-idx]!=B[m-idx]){
                chk=true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(idx>min(n,m)&&chk){
            return NULL;
        }else{
            for(int i=0;i<=n-idx;i++){
                temp=temp->next;
            }
            return temp;

class Solution {
   public:
    int compareVersion(string version1, string version2) {
        vector<int> v1, v2;
        int temp = 0;
        for (auto v : version1) {
            if (v == '.') {
                v1.push_back(temp);
                temp = 0;
            } else {
                temp = temp * 10 + (v - '0');
            }
        }
        v1.push_back(temp);
        temp = 0;
        for (auto v : version2) {
            if (v == '.') {
                v2.push_back(temp);
                temp = 0;
            } else {
                temp = temp * 10 + (v - '0');
            }
        }
        v2.push_back(temp);
        int v1size = v1.size(), v2size = v2.size();
        if (v1.size() < v2.size()) {
            for (int i = 0; i < v2size - v1size; i++) {
                v1.push_back(0);
            }
        } else if (v1.size() > v2.size()) {
            for (int i = 0; i < v1size - v2size; i++) {
                v2.push_back(0);
            }
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < v1.size(); i++) {
            if (v1[i] == v2[i]) {
                continue;
            }
            return v1[i] > v2[i] ? 1 : -1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool closeStrings(string word1, string word2) {
        vector<int> word1Freq(26), word2Freq(26);
        for (auto word : word1) {
            word1Freq[word - 'a']++;
        }
        for (auto word : word2) {
            word2Freq[word - 'a']++;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
            if ((word1Freq[i] == 0 && word2Freq[i] != 0) || (word1Freq[i] != 0 && word2Freq[i] == 0)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        sort(word1Freq.begin(), word1Freq.end());
        sort(word2Freq.begin(), word2Freq.end());
        return word1Freq == word2Freq;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    ListNode* mergeInBetween(ListNode* list1, int a, int b, ListNode* list2) {
        ListNode* left=list1;
        for(int i=0;i<a-1;i++){
            left=left->next;
        }
        ListNode* right=left;
        for(int i=0;i<b-a+2;i++){
            right=right->next;
        }
        // return right;
        left->next=list2;
        while(left->next){
            left=left->next;
        }
        left->next=right;
        return list1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minimumLength(string s) {
        int left=0,right=s.size()-1;
        while(left<right){
            if(s[left]!=s[right]){
                break;
            }
            int now = left;
            while(now<right&&s[now]==s[left]){
                left++;
            }
            while(right>left&&s[now]==s[right]){
                right--;
            }
            // cout<<left<<' '<<right<<endl;
        }
        return right-left+1;
    }
};

class Solution {

        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i-1]>nums[i]){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    bool check(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(isSorted(nums)){
                return true;
            }
            nums.push_back(nums[0]);
            nums.erase(nums.begin());
        }
        return false;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string mergeAlternately(string word1, string word2) {
        int idx1=0,idx2=0,size1=word1.length(),size2=word2.length();
        string ans;
        while(idx1<size1||idx2<size2){
            if(idx1<size1){
                ans+=word1[idx1];
                idx1++;
            }
            if(idx2<size2){
                ans+=word2[idx2];
                idx2++;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<vector<int>> rotate(vector<vector<int>> input){
        int n=input.size();
        vector<vector<int>> output(n,vector<int>(n,0));
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
                output[j][n-i-1]=input[i][j];
            }
        }
        return output;
    }
    bool findRotation(vector<vector<int>>& mat, vector<vector<int>>& target) {
        int n=mat.size();
        for(int turn=0;turn<4;turn++){
            bool chk=true;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
                for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
                    if(mat[i][j]!=target[i][j]){
                        chk=false;
                    }
                }
            }
            if(chk){
                return true;
            }
            mat=rotate(mat);
        }
        return false;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool findPath(vector<vector<int>>& dict, vector<int>& walk, int source,
                  int destination) {
        if (source == destination) {
            return true;
        }
        walk[source] = 1;
        for (auto opt : dict[source]) {
            if (!walk[opt]) {
                if (findPath(dict, walk, opt, destination)) {
                    return true;
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    bool validPath(int n, vector<vector<int>>& edges, int source,
                   int destination) {
        if (source == destination) {
            return true;
        }
        vector<vector<int>> dict(n);
        vector<int> walk(n);
        for (auto edge : edges) {
            dict[edge[0]].push_back(edge[1]);
            dict[edge[1]].push_back(edge[0]);
        }
        // for(auto m:dict){
        //     for(auto d:m){
        //         cout<<d<<' ';
        //     }cout<<endl;
        // }
        return findPath(dict, walk, source, destination);
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<vector<int>> findFarmland(vector<vector<int>>& land) {
        int m = land.size(), n = land[0].size(), cnt = 0, endi, endj;
        vector<vector<int>> landlist;
        bool chk;
        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
                if (land[i][j] == 1 && (i == 0 || land[i - 1][j] == 0) &&
                    (j == 0 || land[i][j - 1] == 0)) {
                    for (endi = i; endi < m; endi++) {
                        if (land[endi][j] == 0) {
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    for (endj = j; endj < n; endj++) {
                        if (land[i][endj] == 0) {
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    landlist.push_back({i, j, endi - 1, endj - 1});
                }
            }
        }
        return landlist;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    void fill(vector<vector<int>>& image, int sr, int sc, int original,
              int color, int n, int m) {
        if (image[sr][sc] == color) {
            return;
        }
        if (image[sr][sc] == original) {
            image[sr][sc] = color;
            if (sr > 0) fill(image, sr - 1, sc, original, color, n, m);
            if (sr + 1 < n) fill(image, sr + 1, sc, original, color, n, m);
            if (sc > 0) fill(image, sr, sc - 1, original, color, n, m);
            if (sc + 1 < m) fill(image, sr, sc + 1, original, color, n, m);
        }
    }
    int numIslands(vector<vector<char>>& grid) {
        int cnt = 2, n = grid.size(), m = grid[0].size();
        vector<vector<int>> map;
        vector<int> temp;
        for (auto a : grid) {
            temp.clear();
            for (auto b : a) {
                temp.push_back(b - '0');
            }
            map.push_back(temp);
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < map.size(); i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < map[0].size(); j++) {
                if (map[i][j] == 1) {
                    fill(map, i, j, 1, cnt, n, m);
                    cnt++;
                }
            }
        }
        return cnt - 2;
    }
};

        int n = word.size();
        for (int idx = 0; idx < n; idx++) {
            if (word[idx] == ch) {
                reverse(word.begin(), word.begin() + idx + 1);
                break;
            }
        }
        return word;
    }
};

    ListNode* reverseList(ListNode* head) {
        vector<int> val;
        ListNode* temp = head;
        while(temp){
            val.push_back(temp->val);
            temp=temp->next;
        }
        temp = head;
        reverse(val.begin(),val.end());
        for(auto n:val){
            temp->val=n;
            temp=temp->next;
        }
        return head;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int pushNum(int startAt, int moveCost, int pushCost, int s){
        int val=0;
        stack<int> st;
        while(s>0){
            st.push(s%10);
            s/=10;
        }
        while(!st.empty()){
            if(startAt!=st.top()){
                val+=moveCost;
                startAt=st.top();
            }
            val+=pushCost;
            st.pop();
        }
        return val;
    }

    int minCostSetTime(int startAt, int moveCost, int pushCost, int targetSeconds) {
        int m=0,s=targetSeconds;
        int ans=1e9;
        while(s>=100){
            m+=1;
            s-=60;
        }
        while(s>=0&&m<100){
            ans=min(ans,pushNum(startAt,moveCost,pushCost,m*100+s));
            m+=1;
            s-=60;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int countLatticePoints(vector<vector<int>>& circles) {
        set<pair<int,int>> temp;
        for(auto c:circles){
            int midx=c[0],midy=c[1],r=c[2],r_sqr=c[2]*c[2];
            for(int x=-r;x<=r;x++){
                for(int y=-r;y<=r;y++){
                    if(x*x+y*y<=r_sqr){
                        temp.insert({midx+x,midy+y});
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return temp.size();
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minimumAverageDifference(vector<int>& nums) {
        long long sum=0;
        for(auto num:nums){
            sum+=num;
        }
        int n=nums.size();
        long long now=0,minVal=1e5,minIdx=0,temp;
        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){
            now+=nums[i];
            sum-=nums[i];
            temp=abs(now/(i+1)-sum/(n-i-1));
            if(temp<minVal){
                minVal=temp;
                minIdx=i;
            }
        }
        if((now+nums[n-1])/n<minVal){
            minIdx=n-1;
        }
        return minIdx;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int calculate(string s) {
        stack<int> st;
        int now=0;
        char sign='+';
        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
            if('0'<=s[i] && s[i]<='9'){
                now = 10*now + (s[i]-'0');
            }
            if(!('0'<=s[i] && s[i]<='9') && s[i]!=' ' || i==s.size()-1){
                if(sign=='+'){
                    st.push(now);
                }
                else if(sign=='-'){
                    st.push(-1*now);
                }
                else{
                    int num;
                    if(sign=='*'){
                        num=st.top()*now;
                    }
                    else{
                        num=st.top()/now;
                    }
                    st.pop();
                    st.push(num);
                }
                sign=s[i];
                now=0;
            }
        }
        int sum = 0;
        while(!st.empty()){
            sum+=st.top();
            st.pop();
        }
        return sum;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> majorityElement(vector<int>& nums) {
        vector<int> ans;
        int limit=nums.size()/3;
        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());
        int now=nums[0],cnt=0;
        for(auto num:nums){
            if(now==num){
                cnt++;
            }else{
                if(cnt>limit){
                    ans.push_back(now);
                }
                now=num;
                cnt=1;
            }
        }
        if(cnt>limit){
            ans.push_back(now);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool check_special_char(char c){
        string special="!@#$%^&*()-+";
        for(auto s:special){
            if(c==s){
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    bool strongPasswordCheckerII(string password) {
        int n=password.size();
        bool upper=false,lower=false,digit=false,special=false;
        char lastword='>';
        for(auto c:password){
            if(c==lastword)
                return false;
            else if('A'<=c&&c<='Z')
                upper=true;
            else if('a'<=c&&c<='z')
                lower=true;
            else if('0'<=c&&c<='9')
                digit=true;
            else if(check_special_char(c))
                special=true;
            lastword=c;
        }
        return n>7&&upper&&lower&&digit&&special;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool eval(TreeNode* root){
        if(root->val==0){
            return false;
        }
        else if(root->val==1){
            return true;
        }
        else if(root->val==2){
            return eval(root->left)||eval(root->right);
        }
        else if(root->val==3){
            return eval(root->left)&&eval(root->right);
        }
        return false;
    }
    bool evaluateTree(TreeNode* root) {
        return eval(root);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> numberOfPairs(vector<int>& nums) {
        int pair=0,left=0,temp=0,now=nums[0];
        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());
        for(auto num:nums){
            if(now==num){
                temp++;
            }else{
                pair+=temp/2;
                left+=temp%2;
                temp=1;
                now=num;
            }
        }
        pair+=temp/2;
        left+=temp%2;
        return {pair,left};
    }
};

            temp[item[0]]+=item[1];
        }
        vector<vector<int>> ans;
        for(int i=0;i<1001;i++){
            if(temp[i]!=0){

        }
        return ans;

};

class Solution {
public:
    int arithmeticTriplets(vector<int>& nums, int diff) {
        int cnt=0,n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){
            for(int j=i+1;j<n-1;j++){
                if(nums[j]-nums[i]==diff){
                    for(int k=j+1;k<n;k++){
                        if(nums[k]-nums[j]==diff){
                            cnt++;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return cnt;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int longestIdealString(string s, int k) {
        int n = s.size(), ans = 0, temp = 0, nowWordIdx;
        vector<int> cnt(26, 0);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            temp = 0;
            nowWordIdx = s[i] - 'a';
            for (int j = max(nowWordIdx - k, 0); j <= min(nowWordIdx + k, 25); j++) {
                if (cnt[j] > temp) {
                    temp = cnt[j];
                }
            }
            cnt[nowWordIdx] = temp + 1;
            ans = max(ans, temp + 1);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<vector<int>> largestLocal(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int n = grid.size(), temp = 0;
        vector<vector<int>> ans(n - 2, vector<int>(n - 2, 0));
        for (int i = 1; i < n - 1; i++) {
            for (int j = 1; j < n - 1; j++) {
                int max = 0;
                for (int k = i - 1; k <= i + 1; k++) {
                    for (int l = j - 1; l <= j + 1; l++) {
                        if (grid[k][l] > max) max = grid[k][l];
                    }
                }
                ans[i - 1][j - 1] = max;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> productExceptSelf(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n=nums.size();
        vector<int> ans(n),left(n),right(n);
        left[0]=1;
        right[n-1]=1;
        for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++){
            left[i]=nums[i-1]*left[i-1];
            right[n-i-1]=nums[n-i]*right[n-i];
        }
        left[n-1]=nums[n-2]*left[n-2];
        right[0]=nums[1]*right[1];
        // for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        //     cout<<left[i]<<' ';
        // }cout<<endl;
        // for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        //     cout<<right[i]<<' ';
        // }cout<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            ans[i]=right[i]*left[i];
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minNumberOfHours(int initialEnergy, int initialExperience, vector<int>& energy, vector<int>& experience) {
        int n=energy.size();
        int time=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(initialEnergy>energy[i]){
                initialEnergy-=energy[i];
            }else{
                time+=energy[i]-initialEnergy+1;
                initialEnergy=1;
            }
            if(initialExperience>experience[i]){
                initialExperience+=experience[i];
            }else{
                time+=experience[i]-initialExperience+1;
                initialExperience=2*experience[i]+1;
            }
        }
        return time;
    }
};

class Solution {

    bool searchMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix, int target) {
        int m=matrix.size(),n=matrix[0].size();
        int i=0,j=n-1;
        while(i<m&&j>=0){
            if(matrix[i][j]==target){
                return true;
            }else if(matrix[i][j]>target){
                j--;
            }else{
                i++;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int stringToDate(string time){
        int month[]={0, 31, 59, 90, 120, 151, 181, 212, 243, 273, 304, 334};
        return month[(time[0]-'0')*10+(time[1]-'0')-1]+(time[3]-'0')*10+(time[4]-'0');
    }
    int countDaysTogether(string arriveAlice, string leaveAlice, string arriveBob, string leaveBob) {
        int lea=min(stringToDate(leaveAlice),stringToDate(leaveBob));
        int arr=max(stringToDate(arriveAlice),stringToDate(arriveBob));
        if(lea-arr<0){
            return 0;
        }else{
            return lea-arr+1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool chk_one(vector<int>& now){
        bool chk=true;
        int idx;
        for(idx=1;now[idx]>1;idx++){
            if(now[0]!=now[idx]){
                return false;
            }
        }
        if(now[idx]==0){
            return false;
        }
        if(idx==now.size()-1){
            return true;
        }
        if(now[idx+1]==1){
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }

    bool equalFrequency(string word) {

        vector<int> abc(26,0);
        for(auto c:word){
            abc[c-'a']++;
        }
        sort(abc.begin(),abc.end(),greater<int>());

        if(abc[0]==1){
            return true;
        }

        if(chk_one(abc)){
            return true;
        }

        bool chk=true;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(abc[i]==0){
                break;
            }
            chk=true;
            for(int j=0;j<26;j++){
                if(abc[j]==0){
                    break;
                }
                if(i!=j&&abc[i]-1!=abc[j]){
                    chk=false;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(chk){
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
};

    int hardestWorker(int n, vector<vector<int>>& logs) {
        int now=0,maxVal=0,maxIdx=0;
        for(auto log:logs){
            if(log[1]-now>maxVal){
                maxIdx=log[0];
                maxVal=log[1]-now;
            }else if(log[1]-now==maxVal){
                maxIdx=min(maxIdx,log[0]);
            }
            now=log[1];
        }
        return maxIdx;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    long long maximumSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        vector<int> cnt(1e5+1);
        int chk=0,n=nums.size();
        long long sum=0,ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++){
            cnt[nums[i]]++;
            sum+=nums[i];
            if(cnt[nums[i]]==1){
                chk++;
            }
        }
        for(int i=k-1;i<n;i++){
            cnt[nums[i]]++;
            sum+=nums[i];
            if(cnt[nums[i]]==1){
                chk++;
                if(chk==k){
                    ans=max(ans,sum);
                }
            }
            cnt[nums[i-k+1]]--;
            sum-=nums[i-k+1];
            if(cnt[nums[i-k+1]]==0){
                chk--;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

        for(int i=0;i<n/2;i++){

            if(find(temp.begin(), temp.end(), now) == temp.end()){
                temp.push_back(now);
            }
        }
        return temp.size();

};

class Solution {

    int pivotInteger(int n) {

        if(n==1)return 1;
        int now=0;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
            now+=i;
            if(now==total){
                return i;
            }
            total-=i;
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    ListNode* removeNodes(ListNode* head) {
        vector<int> temp;
        while (head != NULL) {
            temp.push_back(head->val);
            head = head->next;
        }
        int n = temp.size();
        int nowMax = temp[n - 1];
        for (int i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            if (temp[i] >= nowMax) {
                nowMax = temp[i];
            } else {
                temp.erase(temp.begin() + i);
            }
        }
        ListNode* ans = new ListNode(temp[0]);
        ListNode* now = ans;
        for(int i = 1; i < temp.size(); i++) {
            now->next = new ListNode(temp[i]);
            now = now->next;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int getCommon(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {
        int i=0,j=0,m=nums1.size(),n=nums2.size();
        while(i<m&&j<n){
            if(nums1[i]<nums2[j])
                i++;
            else if(nums1[i]>nums2[j])
                j++;
            else
                return nums1[i];

class Solution {
public:
    long long sizeOfVal(int n){
        int ret=1;
        while(n>0){
            ret*=10;
            n/=10;
        }
        return ret;
    }
    long long findTheArrayConcVal(vector<int>& nums) {
        int i=0,j=nums.size()-1;
        long long ans=0;
        while(i<j){
            ans+=nums[i]*sizeOfVal(nums[j])+nums[j];
            i++;
            j--;
        }
        if(i==j){
            ans+=nums[i];
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int splitNum(int num) {
        vector<int> val;
        while(num>0){
            val.push_back(num%10);
            num/=10;
        }
        sort(val.begin(),val.end());
        int a=0,b=0;
        int n=val.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(i%2==0){
                a=a*10+val[i];
            }else{
                b=b*10+val[i];
            }
        }
        return a+b;
    }
};

public:

            return n-(pass-(n-1));
        }
        return 1+pass;
    }
};

        for(auto num:nums){
            auto idx=find(ans.begin(),ans.end(),num);
            if(idx==ans.end()){
                ans.push_back(num);
            }else{
                ans.erase(idx);
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minNumber(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {
        for(int i=1;i<10;i++){
            if(find(nums1.begin(),nums1.end(),i)!=nums1.end()&&find(nums2.begin(),nums2.end(),i)!=nums2.end()){
                return i;
            }
        }
        int a=10,b=10;
        for(auto num:nums1){
            a=min(a,num);
        }
        for(auto num:nums2){
            b=min(b,num);
        }
        if(a>b){
            return b*10+a;
        }
        return a*10+b;
    }
};

            n/=5;
        }
        return n==1;

class Solution {

        if(v<0){
            cnt++;
            v*=-1;
        }
        while(v>9){
            cnt++;
            v/=10;
        }
        return cnt;
    }
    vector<int> findColumnWidth(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int m=grid.size(),n=grid[0].size(),maxL;
        vector<int> ans;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            maxL=0;
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                maxL=max(maxL,lengthOfValue(grid[j][i]));
            }
            ans.push_back(maxL);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int first_digit(int a){
        while(a>=10){
            a/=10;
        }
        return a;
    }
    int gcd(int a, int b){
        while(b > 0){
            int t = a % b;
            a = b;
            b = t;
        }
        return a;
    }
    int countBeautifulPairs(vector<int>& nums) {
        int ans=0;
        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){
            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++){
                if(gcd(first_digit(nums[i]),nums[j]%10)==1){
                    ans++;
                }
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int hIndex(vector<int>& citations) {
        int n=citations.size();
        int l=0,r=n-1,m;
        while(l<=r){
            m=(r+l+1)/2;
            if(citations[m]==n-m){
                return n-m;
            }
            else if(citations[m]<n-m){
                l=m+1;
            }
            else{
                r=m-1;
            }
        }
        return n-l;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int numberOfGoodSubarraySplits(vector<int>& nums) {
        int MOD=1e9+7;
        int n=nums.size();
        int temp=1;
        long long int ans=1;
        int i;
        bool allz=true;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i]==1){
                allz=false;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(allz){
            return 0;
        }
        for(i=i+1;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i]){
                ans=(ans*temp)%MOD;
                temp=1;
            }else{
                temp++;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int longestAlternatingSubarray(vector<int>& nums, int threshold) {
        int ans=0,cnt=1,n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i]%2==0&&nums[i]<=threshold){
                ans=max(ans,cnt);
                for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++){
                    if(nums[j]<=threshold&&nums[j]%2!=nums[j-1]%2){
                        cnt++;
                    }else{
                        cnt=1;
                        break;
                    }
                    ans=max(ans,cnt);
                }
                cnt=1;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isPrime(int v){
        int s=sqrt(v);
        for(int i=2;i<=s;i++){
            if(v%i==0){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    vector<vector<int>> findPrimePairs(int n) {
        vector<vector<int>> ans;
        if(n<=2){
            return ans;
        }

        int x=3;
        while(x<=n/2){
            if(isPrime(x)){
                if(isPrime(n-x)){
                    ans.push_back({x,n-x});
                }
            }
            x+=2;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int maximumBeauty(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        vector<int> temp(100001,0);
        for(auto num:nums){
            temp[num]++;
        }
        int now=0;
        for(int i=0;i<min(2*k,100001);i++){
            now+=temp[i];
        }
        int ans=now;
        for(int i=2*k;i<100001;i++){
            now+=temp[i];
            ans=max(ans,now);
            now-=temp[i-2*k];
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minimumIndex(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n = nums.size();
        vector<pair<int,int>> left(n);
        vector<pair<int,int>> right(n);

        unordered_map<int, int> rFreq;
        int rNum=0,rCnt=0;
        for(int i=n-1;i>0;i--){
            rFreq[nums[i]]++;
            if(rFreq[nums[i]]>rCnt){
                rNum = nums[i];
                rCnt=rFreq[nums[i]];
            }
            right[i-1]={rNum,rCnt};
        }

        unordered_map<int, int> freq;
        int leftNum=0,leftCnt=0;
        for (int i=0;i<n-1;i++) {
            freq[nums[i]]++;
            if(freq[nums[i]]>leftCnt){
                leftNum = nums[i];
                leftCnt = freq[nums[i]];
            }

            if (leftNum==right[i].first) {
                if(leftCnt * 2 > i+1 && right[i].second * 2 > (n-i-1)){
                    return i;
                }
            }
        }
        return -1;

    }
};

        vector<string> ans;
        string temp;
        for(auto word:words){
            temp="";
            for(auto c:word){
                if(c==separator){
                    if(temp!=""){
                        ans.push_back(temp);
                        temp="";
                    }
                }else{
                    temp+=c;
                }
            }
            if(temp!=""){
                ans.push_back(temp);
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

            if(nums[i-1]<=temp[i]){

        }

    }

class Solution {
public:
    ListNode* doubleIt(ListNode* head) {
        ListNode* ans=new ListNode();
        if(head->val>4){
            ans->next=head;
        }else{
            ans=head;
        }
        ListNode* temp=ans;
        while(temp){
            temp->val=(2*temp->val)%10;
            if(temp->next)
                if(temp->next->val>4)
                    temp->val++;
            temp=temp->next;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {

    int furthestDistanceFromOrigin(string moves) {
        int space=0,pos=0;
        for(auto c:moves){
            if(c=='_'){
                space++;
            }else if(c=='L'){
                pos--;
            }else{
                pos++;
            }
        }
        return pos>=0?pos+space:-1*(pos-space);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isSymmetric(int val){
        if(val<10){
            return 0;
        }else if(val<100){
            val*=10;
        }else if(val<1000){
            return 0;
        }else if(val>9999){
            return 0;
        }
        int a,b,c,d;
        a=val%10;
        val/=10;
        b=val%10;
        val/=10;
        c=val%10;
        val/=10;
        d=val%10;
        return a+b==c+d;
    }
    int countSymmetricIntegers(int low, int high) {
        int cnt=0;
        for(int i=low;i<=high;i++){
            cnt+=isSymmetric(i);
        }
        return cnt;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minimumRightShifts(vector<int>& nums) {
        int idx=0,n=nums.size();
        while(idx+1<n&&nums[idx]<nums[idx+1]){
            idx++;
        }
        if(idx==n-1){
            return 0;
        }
        idx++;
        int temp=idx;
        while(idx+1<n&&nums[idx]<nums[idx+1]){
            idx++;
        }
        if(idx!=n-1){
            return -1;
        }
        if(nums[temp]<nums[0]&&nums[n-1]<nums[0]){
            return n-temp;
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int binaryONES(int i){
        int ones=0;
        while(i>0){
            ones+=i%2;
            i/=2;
        }
        return ones;
    }
    int sumIndicesWithKSetBits(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        int ans=0,n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(binaryONES(i)==k){
                ans+=nums[i];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    long long maximumTripletValue(vector<int>& nums) {
        long long ans=0,m;
        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){
            for(int j=i+1;j<n-1;j++){
                if(nums[i]-nums[j]>0){
                    m=0;
                    for(int k=j+1;k<n;k++){
                        m=max(m,(long long)nums[k]);
                    }
                    ans=max(ans,(long long)(nums[i]-nums[j])*m);
                }
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minSizeSubarray(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        long long sum=0,cnt=0,loop=0,ans=2e9;
        vector<int> temp=nums;
        for(auto num:nums){
            sum+=num;
            cnt++;
            temp.push_back(num);
        }
        if(target%sum==0){
            return (target/sum)*cnt;
        }
        if(target>sum){
            loop+=(target/sum)*cnt;
            target%=sum;
        }
        int n=nums.size();
        int i=0,j=1;
        int now=nums[i];
        while(i<n&&j<2*n){
            if(now<target){
                now+=temp[j];
                j++;
            }else if(now==target){
                ans=min(ans,loop+j-i);
                now-=temp[i];
                i++;
            }else{
                now-=temp[i];
                i++;
            }
        }
        return ans==2e9?-1:ans;
    }
};

class Solution {

    vector<int> findIndices(vector<int>& nums, int indexDifference, int valueDifference) {
        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=i;j<n;j++){
                if(abs(i-j)>=indexDifference&&abs(nums[i]-nums[j])>=valueDifference){
                    return {i,j};
                }
            }
        }
        return {-1,-1};
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string chooseBetter(string a,string b){
        if(a==""){
            return b;
        }
        if(a.size()==b.size()){
            int n=a.size();
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
                if(a[i]>b[i]){
                    return b;
                }else if(a[i]<b[i]){
                    return a;
                }
            }
        }else if(a.size()>b.size()){
            return b;
        }
        return a;
    }
    string shortestBeautifulSubstring(string s, int k) {
        string ans="",now="";
        int i=0,j=0,n=s.size(),cnt=0;
        while(i<n&&j<n){
            cnt+=(s[i]=='1');
            now+=s[i];
            i++;
            if(cnt==k){
                if(now[0]=='1'){
                    ans=chooseBetter(ans,now);
                    cnt--;
                    now.erase(0,1);
                }else{
                    while(now[0]=='0'){
                        ans=chooseBetter(ans,now);
                        now.erase(0,1);
                    }
                    ans=chooseBetter(ans,now);
                    cnt--;
                    now.erase(0,1);
                }
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> findIndices(vector<int>& nums, int indexDifference, int valueDifference) {
        int minIdx=0,maxIdx=0,n=nums.size();
        for(int i=indexDifference;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i-indexDifference]<nums[minIdx]){
                minIdx=i-indexDifference;
            }
            if(nums[i-indexDifference]>nums[maxIdx]){
                maxIdx=i-indexDifference;
            }
            if(nums[i]-nums[minIdx]>=valueDifference){
                return {minIdx,i};
            }
            if(nums[maxIdx]-nums[i]>=valueDifference){
                return {maxIdx,i};
            }
        }
        return {-1,-1};
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<vector<int>> constructProductMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int n=grid.size(),m=grid[0].size(),mod=12345;
        long long p=1;
        vector<vector<int>> ans(n,vector<int>(m));
        vector<vector<int>> totalX(n,vector<int>(m));
        vector<vector<int>> totalY(n,vector<int>(m));
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                totalX[i][j]=p;
                p=(p*grid[i][j])%mod;
            }
        }
        p=1;
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
            for(int j=m-1;j>=0;j--){
                totalY[i][j]=p;
                p=(p*grid[i][j])%mod;
            }
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                ans[i][j]=(totalX[i][j]*totalY[i][j])%mod;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {

    int minimumSum(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n=nums.size();
        vector<int> l(n,1e9),r(n,1e9);
        int lmin=nums[0],rmin=nums[n-1];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            lmin=min(lmin,nums[i]);
            l[i]=lmin;
        }
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
            rmin=min(rmin,nums[i]);
            r[i]=rmin;
        }
        int ans=1e9;
        for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++){
            if(l[i]<nums[i]&&r[i]<nums[i]){
                ans=min(ans,nums[i]+l[i]+r[i]);
            }
        }
        if(ans==1e9){
            return -1;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

        for(int i=0;i<31;i++){
            cnt=0;

            if(total1>=total2+zero2){
                return total1;

            if(total2>=total1+zero1){
                return total2;
            }

            if(total1==total2){
                return total1;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

        for (auto num : nums) {

        }
        return ans;

class Solution {
public:
    static bool cmp(string a, string b)
    {
        if(a.size()<b.size()){
            return true;
        }else if(a.size()>b.size()){
            return false;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<a.size();i++){
            if(a[i]<b[i]){
                return true;
            }else if(a[i]>b[i]){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    vector<string> sublist(string a){
        vector<string> ret;
        for(int i=1;i<=a.size();i++){
            for(int j=0;j+i<=a.size();j++){
                // cout<<a.substr(i+j-i,i)<<endl;
                if(find(ret.begin(),ret.end(),a.substr(i+j-i,i))==ret.end()){
                    ret.push_back(a.substr(i+j-i,i));
                }
            }
        }
        sort(ret.begin(),ret.end(),cmp);
        return ret;
    }
    vector<string> shortestSubstrings(vector<string>& arr) {
        vector<string> ans;
        int n=arr.size();
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            vector<string> substring=sublist(arr[i]);
            string now="";
            for(auto s:substring){
                bool chk=false;
                for(int j=0;j<n&&chk==false;j++){
                    if(i!=j){
                        if(arr[j].find(s)!=string::npos){
                            chk=true;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if(!chk){
                    now=s;
                    break;
                }
            }
            ans.push_back(now);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int maxProfit(vector<int>& prices) {
        int n=prices.size(),now;
        vector<int> temp(n);
        vector<int> historyMax(n);
        if(n<2){
            return 0;
        }
        temp[1]=max(temp[1],prices[1]-prices[0]);
        historyMax[1]=temp[1];
        for(int i=2;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=i-1;j>=0;j--){
                now=prices[i]-prices[j];
                if(now>temp[i]){
                    temp[i]=now;
                }
                if(j!=0){
                    if(j>2){
                        if(historyMax[j-2]+now>temp[i]){
                            temp[i]=historyMax[j-2]+now;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            historyMax[i]=max(historyMax[i-1],temp[i]);
        }
        int ans=0;
        for(auto p:temp){
            ans=max(ans,p);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<vector<int>> tree;
    vector<int> treeCnt;
    vector<int> maxDepth(vector<int> leafs) {
        vector<int> newLeafs;
        for (auto leaf : leafs) {
            for (auto node : tree[leaf]) {
                if (treeCnt[node] != 0) {
                    treeCnt[node]--;
                    if (treeCnt[node] == 1) {
                        newLeafs.push_back(node);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if (newLeafs.size() == 0) {
            return leafs;
        }
        return maxDepth(newLeafs);
    }
    vector<int> findMinHeightTrees(int n, vector<vector<int>>& edges) {
        if (n == 1) {
            return {0};
        }
        tree.resize(n);
        treeCnt.resize(n);
        for (auto edge : edges) {
            tree[edge[0]].push_back(edge[1]);
            tree[edge[1]].push_back(edge[0]);
            treeCnt[edge[0]]++;
            treeCnt[edge[1]]++;
        }
        vector<int> leafs;
        for (int i = 0; i < treeCnt.size(); i++) {
            if (treeCnt[i] == 1) {
                treeCnt[i]--;
                leafs.push_back(i);
            }
        }
        return maxDepth(leafs);
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool isPrime(int a) {
        for (int i = a - 1; i > 1; i--) {
            if (a % i == 0) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    int maximumPrimeDifference(vector<int>& nums) {
        vector<int> prime;
        prime.push_back(2);
        for (int i = 3; i < 100; i++) {
            if (isPrime(i)) {
                prime.push_back(i);
            }
        }
        int left = 0, right = nums.size() - 1;
        while (find(prime.begin(), prime.end(), nums[left]) == prime.end()) {
            left++;
        }
        while (find(prime.begin(), prime.end(), nums[right]) == prime.end()) {
            right--;
        }
        cout << left << ' ' << right << endl;
        return right - left;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int numberOfSpecialChars(string word) {
        vector<int> lower(26), upper(26);
        for (auto w : word) {
            if (w < 'a') {
                upper[w - 'A']++;
            } else {
                lower[w - 'a']++;
            }
        }
        int cnt = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
            if (upper[i] > 0 && lower[i] > 0) {
                cnt++;
            }
        }
        return cnt;
    }
};

    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minimumAddedInteger(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {
        int sum1=0,sum2=0,n1=nums1.size(),n2=nums2.size(),idx2;
        sort(nums1.begin(),nums1.end());
        sort(nums2.begin(),nums2.end());
        for(auto num:nums1){
            sum1+=num;
        }
        for(auto num:nums2){
            sum2+=num;
        }
        int temp;
        for(int i=0;i<n1;i++){
            for(int j=i+1;j<n1;j++){
                temp=(sum2-sum1+nums1[i]+nums1[j])/n2;
                idx2=0;
                for(int k=0;j<n1&&idx2<n2;k++){
                    if(k==i||k==j){
                        continue;
                    }
                    if(nums2[idx2]-nums1[k]==temp){
                        idx2++;
                    }else{
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if(idx2==n2){
                    return temp;
                }
            }
        }
        return 0;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool isValid(string word) {
        if (word.size() < 3) {
            return false;
        }
        bool vowel = false, consonant = false;
        for (auto w : word) {
            if (('a' <= w && w <= 'z') || ('A' <= w && w <= 'Z') || ('0' <= w && w <= '9')) {
                if (w == 'a' || w == 'e' || w == 'i' || w == 'o' || w == 'u') {
                    vowel = true;
                } else if (w == 'A' || w == 'E' || w == 'I' || w == 'O' || w == 'U') {
                    vowel = true;
                } else if (('a' <= w && w <= 'z') || ('A' <= w && w <= 'Z')) {
                    consonant = true;
                }
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return vowel && consonant;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int minimumOperationsToMakeKPeriodic(string word, int k) {
        map<string, int> mp;
        string temp = "";
        int maxPeriod = 0;
        for (auto w : word) {
            temp += w;
            if (temp.size() == k) {
                mp[temp]++;
                maxPeriod = max(maxPeriod, mp[temp]);
                temp = "";
            }
        }
        return (word.size() - maxPeriod * k) / k;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int minAnagramLength(string s) {
        int letters[26] = {0};
        int n = s.size(), left = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            letters[s[i] - 'a']++;
        }
        int maxFactor = INT_MAX;
        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
            if (letters[i] > 0) {
                for (int j = letters[i]; j > 0; j--) {
                    if (letters[i] % j == 0 && n % j == 0) {
                        maxFactor = min(maxFactor, j);
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        int ans = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
            if (letters[i] > 0) {
                ans += letters[i] / maxFactor;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

        int n = s.size();
        vector<int> idx(26, -1);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            idx[s[i] - 'a'] = i;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            idx[t[i] - 'a'] = abs(idx[t[i] - 'a'] - i);
        }
        int ans = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
            if(idx[i] != -1) {
                ans += idx[i];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int maximumEnergy(vector<int>& energy, int k) {
        int n = energy.size(), ans = -1e9;
        vector<int> dp(n, 0);
        for (int i = n - 1; i >= n - k; i--) {
            dp[i] = energy[i];
            ans = max(ans, dp[i]);
        }
        for (int i = n - k - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            dp[i] = energy[i] + dp[i + k];
            ans = max(ans, dp[i]);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int maxScore(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int n = grid.size(), m = grid[0].size();
        vector<vector<int>> dp(n, vector<int>(m, 0));
        dp[n - 1][m - 1] = 0;
        for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
            dp[i][m - 1] = max(grid[i + 1][m - 1], dp[i + 1][m - 1]);
        }
        for (int j = m - 2; j >= 0; j--) {
            dp[n - 1][j] = max(grid[n - 1][j + 1], dp[n - 1][j + 1]);
        }
        for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
            for (int j = m - 2; j >= 0; j--) {
                dp[i][j] = max(max(grid[i + 1][j], grid[i][j + 1]), max(dp[i + 1][j], dp[i][j + 1]));
            }
        }
        int ans = -1e9;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
                // cout << dp[i][j] << " ";
                if (i == n - 1 && j == m - 1) continue;
                ans = max(ans, dp[i][j] - grid[i][j]);
            }
            // cout << endl;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

        }

    }
};

            if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u'||s[i]=='A'||s[i]=='E'||s[i]=='I'||s[i]=='O'||s[i]=='U'){
                while(s[left]!='a'&&s[left]!='e'&&s[left]!='i'&&s[left]!='o'&&s[left]!='u'&&s[left]!='A'&&s[left]!='E'&&s[left]!='I'&&s[left]!='O'&&s[left]!='U'){
                    left--;
                }
                ans+=s[left];
                left--;
            }else{
                ans+=s[i];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int guessNumber(int n) {
        int left = 1, right = n, mid;
        int status;
        while (left <= right) {
            mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
            status = guess(mid);
            if (status == 1) {
                left = mid+1;
            } else if (status == -1) {
                right = mid;
            } else {
                break;
            }
        }
        return mid;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<vector<int>> ans;
    void compare(vector<int> candidates, vector<int> temp, int target) {
        if (candidates.size() > 0) {
            int now = candidates[0];
            vector<int> newCandidates = candidates;
            newCandidates.erase(newCandidates.begin());
            compare(newCandidates, temp, target);
            while (target - now > 0) {
                temp.push_back(now);
                target -= now;
                compare(newCandidates, temp, target);
            }
            if (target - now == 0) {
                temp.push_back(now);
                ans.push_back(temp);
            }
        }
        return;
    }
    vector<vector<int>> combinationSum(vector<int>& candidates, int target) {
        compare(candidates, {}, target);
        sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {

    int calcLeft(TreeNode* root) {
        int val = 0;
        if (root->left != NULL) {
            if (root->left->left == NULL && root->left->right == NULL) {
                val += root->left->val;
            } else {
                val += calcLeft(root->left);
            }
        }
        if (root->right != NULL) {
            val += calcLeft(root->right);
        }
        return val;
    }
    int sumOfLeftLeaves(TreeNode* root) { return calcLeft(root); }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int firstMissingPositive(vector<int>& nums) {
        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());
        int idx=0,n=nums.size();
        for(;idx<n;idx++){
            if(nums[idx]>0){
                break;
            }
        }
        int i=1;
        for(;idx<n;i++){
            if(nums[idx]==i){
                while(nums[idx]==i&&idx+1<n){
                    idx++;
                }
            }else{
                return i;
            }
        }
        return i;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int trap(vector<int>& height) {
        int n = height.size() - 1;
        int leftMax = height[0], rightMax = height[n];
        vector<int> left(n + 1), right(n + 1);
        for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
            if (height[i] > leftMax) {
                leftMax = height[i];
            } else {
                left[i] = leftMax - height[i];
            }
            if (height[n - i] > rightMax) {
                rightMax = height[n - i];
            } else {
                right[n - i] = rightMax - height[n - i];
            }
        }
        int ans = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
            ans += min(left[i], right[i]);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    static bool cmp(vector<int> a,vector<int> b){
        if(a[0]==b[0])
            return a[1]<b[1];
        return a[0]<b[0];
    }
    int findMinArrowShots(vector<vector<int>>& points) {
        sort(points.begin(),points.end(),cmp);
        int n=points.size();
        int pos=points[0][1];
        int arrow=1;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
            if(points[i][1]<pos){
                pos=points[i][1];
            }
            else if(points[i][0]>pos){
                arrow++;
                pos=points[i][1];
            }
        }
        return arrow;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    bool find132pattern(vector<int>& nums) {
        if (nums.size() < 3) return false;
        int n = nums.size(), temp = nums[0];
        vector<int> minval(n);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            temp = min(temp, nums[i]);
            minval[i] = temp;
        }
        stack<int> val;
        for (int i = n - 1; i > 0; i--) {
            if (nums[i] <= minval[i]) {
                continue;
            }
            while (!val.empty() && val.top() <= minval[i]) {
                val.pop();
            }
            if (!val.empty() && val.top() < nums[i]) {
                return true;
            }
            val.push(nums[i]);
        }
        return false;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int cnt = 0, m = grid.size() - 1, n = grid[0].size() - 1;
        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
                if (grid[i][j]) {
                    if (i == 0)
                        cnt++;
                    else if (!grid[i - 1][j])
                        cnt++;
                    if (j == 0)
                        cnt++;
                    else if (!grid[i][j - 1])
                        cnt++;
                    if (i == m)
                        cnt++;
                    else if (!grid[i + 1][j])
                        cnt++;
                    if (j == n)
                        cnt++;
                    else if (!grid[i][j + 1])
                        cnt++;
                }
            }
        }
        return cnt;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    double Pow(double x, long long n){
        if(n==0) {
            return 1;
        }
        if(n<0) {
            n=-1*n;
            x=1/x;
        }
        if(n%2==0){
            return Pow(x*x, n/2);
        }
        else{
            return x*Pow(x, n-1);
        }
    }
    double myPow(double x, int n) {
        return Pow(x,n);
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<string> findRelativeRanks(vector<int>& score) {
        map<int, int> m;
        int n = score.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            m[score[i]] = i;
        }
        sort(score.begin(), score.end(), greater<int>());
        vector<string> ans(n);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (i == 0) {
                ans[m[score[i]]] = "Gold Medal";
            } else if (i == 1) {
                ans[m[score[i]]] = "Silver Medal";
            } else if (i == 2) {
                ans[m[score[i]]] = "Bronze Medal";
            } else {
                ans[m[score[i]]] = to_string(i + 1);
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {

    string reverseWords(string s) {
        string ans="",temp="";
        for(auto c:s){
            if(c!=' '){
                temp=c+temp;
            }else{
                if(ans==""){
                    ans=temp;
                }else{
                    ans+=" "+temp;
                }
                temp="";
            }
        }
        if(ans==""){
            ans=temp;
        }else{
            ans+=" "+temp;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<vector<int>> insert(vector<vector<int>>& intervals, vector<int>& newInterval) {
        int n=intervals.size();
        if(n==0){
            return {newInterval};
        }
        vector<vector<int>> ans;
        int idx=0,left,right;
        for(;idx<n;idx++){
            if(intervals[idx][1]<newInterval[0]){
                ans.push_back(intervals[idx]);
            }else{
                break;
            }
        }
        if(idx==0&&intervals[idx][1]<newInterval[0]){
            ans.push_back(newInterval);
        }else if(idx==n){
            ans.push_back(newInterval);
        }else if(intervals[idx][0]<=newInterval[0]&&newInterval[1]<=intervals[idx][1]){
                ans.push_back(intervals[idx]);
                idx++;
        }else{
            left=min(intervals[idx][0],newInterval[0]);
            right=newInterval[1];
            for(;idx<n;idx++){
                if(intervals[idx][0]<=newInterval[1]){
                    right=max(right,intervals[idx][1]);
                }else{
                    break;
                }
            }
            ans.push_back({left,right});
        }
        for(;idx<n;idx++){
            ans.push_back(intervals[idx]);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string convert(string s, int numRows) {
        if(numRows==1){
            return s;
        }
        vector<vector<char>> temp(numRows,vector<char>(1000,' '));
        bool up=false;
        int i=0,j=0;
        for(char c:s){
            temp[i][j]=c;
            if(up){
                i--;
                j++;
                if(i==0){
                    up=false;
                }
            }else{
                i++;
                if(i==numRows){
                    up=true;
                    i-=2;
                    j++;
                    if(i==0){
                        up=false;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        string ans;
        for(int ii=0;ii<numRows;ii++){
            for(int jj=0;jj<j+1;jj++){
                if(temp[ii][jj]!=' '){
                    ans+=temp[ii][jj];
                }
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool canPlaceFlowers(vector<int>& flowerbed, int n) {
        if(flowerbed.size()==1&&flowerbed[0]==0){
            flowerbed[0]=1;
            n--;
        }
        else{
            for(int i=0;i<flowerbed.size();i++){
                if(i==0&&flowerbed[i]==0&&flowerbed[i+1]==0){
                    flowerbed[i]=1;
                    n--;
                }
                else if(i==flowerbed.size()-1&&flowerbed[i]==0&&flowerbed[i-1]==0){
                    flowerbed[i]=1;
                    n--;
                }
                else if(i!=0&&i!=flowerbed.size()-1&&flowerbed[i-1]+flowerbed[i]+flowerbed[i+1]==0){
                    flowerbed[i]=1;
                    n--;
                }
            }
        }
        if(n>0){
            return false;
        }
        else{
            return true;
        }
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    void insertNode(TreeNode* root, int val, int nowDepth, int depth) {
        if (nowDepth == depth) {
            TreeNode* leftNode = new TreeNode(val, root->left, NULL);
            TreeNode* rightNode = new TreeNode(val, NULL, root->right);
            root->left = leftNode;
            root->right = rightNode;
            return;
        }
        if (root->left) {
            insertNode(root->left, val, nowDepth + 1, depth);
        }
        if (root->right) {
            insertNode(root->right, val, nowDepth + 1, depth);
        }
        return;
    }
    TreeNode* addOneRow(TreeNode* root, int val, int depth) {
        if (depth == 1) {
            return new TreeNode(val, root, NULL);
        }
        insertNode(root, val, 1, depth - 1);
        return root;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    double findMaxAverage(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        double sum=0,ans=-100000;
        int n=nums.size();
        for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++){
            sum+=nums[i];
        }
        for(int i=k-1;i<n;i++){
            sum+=nums[i];
            ans=max(ans,sum/k);
            sum-=nums[i-k+1];
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    void remake(vector<int>& val,TreeNode* root){
        if(root!=NULL){
            val.push_back(root->val);
            remake(val,root->left);
            remake(val,root->right);
        }
        return;
    }
    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {
        vector<int> val;
        remake(val,root);
        sort(val.begin(),val.end());
        for(auto num:val){
            if(k-num!=num){
                for(auto chk:val){
                    if(chk==k-num){
                        return true;
                    }
                }
            }else{
                int cnt=0;
                for(auto chk:val){
                    if(chk==num){
                        cnt++;
                        if(cnt>1){
                            return true;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int maximumJumps(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int n=nums.size();
        vector<int> distance(n,-2);
        distance[0]=0;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=i-1;j>=0;j--){
                if(abs(nums[j]-nums[i])<=target&&distance[j]>=0){
                    distance[i]=max(distance[i],distance[j]);
                }
            }
            distance[i]++;
        }
        return distance[n-1];
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int reverse(int x) {
        bool isNegative = x < 0;
        long long result = 0;
        x = abs(x);
        while (x > 0) {
            result = result * 10 + x % 10;
            x /= 10;
        }
        if (isNegative) {
            result = -result;
        }
        if (result > INT_MAX || result < INT_MIN) {
            return 0;
        }
        return result;
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
   public:
    TreeNode* findNode(TreeNode* root, int val) {
        TreeNode* ans = NULL;
        if (root->val == val) {
            ans = root;
        }
        if (root->left && !ans) {
            ans = findNode(root->left, val);
        }
        if (root->right && !ans) {
            ans = findNode(root->right, val);
        }
        if (ans)
            return ans;
        else
            return NULL;
    }
    TreeNode* searchBST(TreeNode* root, int val) { return findNode(root, val); }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {
        int left=0,right=0,idx=0;
        for(auto n:nums){
            right+=n;
        }
        for(auto n:nums){
            if(left==right-n){
                return idx;
            }
            left+=n;
            right-=n;
            idx++;
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    vector<int> kthSmallestPrimeFraction(vector<int>& arr, int k) {
        int n = arr.size();
        vector<pair<double, pair<int, int>>> frac;
        for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
                frac.push_back({(double)arr[i] / arr[j], {arr[i], arr[j]}});
            }
        }
        sort(frac.begin(), frac.end());
        return {frac[k - 1].second.first, frac[k - 1].second.second};
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string customSortString(string order, string s) {
        int abc[26];
        for(auto c:s){
            abc[c-'a']++;
        }
        string ans;
        for(auto o:order){
            while(abc[o-'a']){
                ans+=o;
                abc[o-'a']--;
            }
        }
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(abc[i]){
                while(abc[i]){
                    ans+=char('a'+i);
                    abc[i]--;
                }
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int myAtoi(string s) {
        int sign = 1, idx = 0, n = s.size();
        long long num = 0;
        while (idx < n && s[idx] == ' ') {
            idx++;
        }
        if (s[idx] == '-' || s[idx] == '+') {
            sign = s[idx] == '-' ? -1 : 1;
            idx++;
        }
        while (idx < n && '0' <= s[idx] && s[idx] <= '9') {
            num = num * 10 + s[idx] - '0';
            if (num > INT_MAX) {
                return sign == 1 ? INT_MAX : INT_MIN;
            }
            idx++;
        }
        return sign * num;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    double mincostToHireWorkers(vector<int>& quality, vector<int>& wage, int k) {
        int n = quality.size();
        vector<pair<double, int>> workers;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            workers.push_back({(double)wage[i] / quality[i], quality[i]});
        }
        sort(workers.begin(), workers.end());
        priority_queue<int> pq;
        int sum = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
            sum += workers[i].second;
            pq.push(workers[i].second);
        }
        double ans = sum * workers[k - 1].first;
        for (int i = k; i < n; i++) {
            pq.push(workers[i].second);
            sum += workers[i].second;
            sum -= pq.top();
            pq.pop();
            ans = min(ans, sum * workers[i].first);
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int gcd(int a, int b){
        while(b > 0){
            int t = a % b;
            a = b;
            b = t;
        }
        return a;
    }
    int mirrorReflection(int p, int q) {
        int ap=p/gcd(p,q);
        int aq=q/gcd(p,q);
        if(ap==aq){
            return 1;
        }
        int sum=0,cnt=1;
        while(aq*cnt%ap!=0){
            cnt++;
        }
        if(cnt%2==0){
            return 2;
        }else if(aq%2==0){
            return 0;
        }else{
            return 1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
};
