class Solution {
   public:
    void allLeafs(TreeNode* root, vector<int>& leaf) {
        if (root->left == nullptr && root->right == nullptr) {
            leaf.push_back(root->val);
        }
        if (root->left != nullptr) {
            allLeafs(root->left, leaf);
        }
        if (root->right != nullptr) {
            allLeafs(root->right, leaf);
        }
        return;
    }
    bool leafSimilar(TreeNode* root1, TreeNode* root2) {
        vector<int> leaf1, leaf2;
        allLeafs(root1, leaf1);
        allLeafs(root2, leaf2);
        return leaf1==leaf2;
    }
};

class Solution {

        ListNode* ans=head;
        int cnt=0;
        while(head){
            if(cnt){
                ans=ans->next;
            }
            head=head->next;
            cnt=(cnt+1)%2;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
   public:
    int numRescueBoats(vector<int>& people, int limit) {
        int p[30001] = {0}, maxPeople = 0;
        for (auto person : people) {
            p[person]++;
            maxPeople = max(person, maxPeople);
        }
        int temp = 0, ans = 0, cnt = 0;
        while (maxPeople > 0) {
            if (p[maxPeople] > 0) {
                temp = 0;
                cnt = 0;
                for (int i = maxPeople; i > 0; i--) {
                    while (temp + i <= limit && p[i] > 0 && cnt < 2) {
                        p[i]--;
                        temp += i;
                        cnt++;
                    }
                }
                if (temp > 0) {
                    ans++;
                }
            } else {
                maxPeople--;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class RLEIterator {
public:
    vector<int> num;
    vector<int> cnt;
    int idx=0,num_siz;

    RLEIterator(vector<int>& encoding) {
        int n=encoding.size();
        idx=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i+=2){
            cnt.push_back(encoding[i]);
            num.push_back(encoding[i+1]);
        }
        num_siz=num.size();
    }

    int next(int n) {
        for(;idx<num_siz;idx++){
            if(cnt[idx]>=n){
                cnt[idx]-=n;
                return num[idx];
            }else{
                n-=cnt[idx];
                cnt[idx]=0;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

class RecentCounter {
public:
    vector<int> val;
    RecentCounter() {
        val.clear();
    }

    int ping(int t) {
        val.push_back(t);
        int ans=0;
        for(auto v:val){
            if(t-3000<=v && v<=t){
                ans++;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool validateStackSequences(vector<int>& pushed, vector<int>& popped) {
        stack<int> s;
        int idxPush=0,idxPop=0,n=popped.size();
        for(auto push_val:pushed){
            s.push(push_val);
            while(!s.empty()&&idxPop<n){
               if(s.top()==popped[idxPop]){
                   s.pop();
                   idxPop++;
               }else{
                   break;
               }
            }
        }
        return idxPop==n;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int calc(int a,int b,int c){
        if(a==c){
            return 1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
    vector<int> prisonAfterNDays(vector<int>& cells, int n) {
        vector<int> now(8),temp(8);
        int loop=(n-1)%14;
        for(int i=0;i<8;i++){
            now[i]=cells[i];
        }
        for(int cnt=0;cnt<=loop;cnt++){
            temp[0]=0;
            for(int i=1;i<7;i++){
                temp[i]=calc(now[i-1],now[i],now[i+1]);
            }
            temp[7]=0;
            for(int i=0;i<8;i++){
                now[i]=temp[i];
            }
        }
        return now;
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
   public:
    vector<string> allString;
    void findString(string temp, TreeNode* root) {
        bool chk = true;
        if (root->left) {
            chk = false;
            findString(char(root->val + 'a') + temp, root->left);
        }
        if (root->right) {
            chk = false;
            findString(char(root->val + 'a') + temp, root->right);
        }
        if (chk) {
            allString.push_back(char(root->val + 'a') + temp);
        }
        return;
    }
    string smallestFromLeaf(TreeNode* root) {
        findString("", root);
        sort(allString.begin(), allString.end());
        // for(auto a:allString){
        //     cout<<a<<endl;
        // }
        return allString[0];
    }
};
